jmarkov.basic

Interface Actions<A extends Action>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - The Action class.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionsSet

    public interface Actions<A extends Action>
extends java.lang.Iterable<A>
    This interface represents a set of objects Action. The user must choose his own data structure and define the constuctors. It´s recommended to use the Set structure to avoid repeated actions. The ActionsSet class extends this class and explotes the goodnesses of Collections. It is recommended to use that class instead of this one for beginner users.
    Author:
    Andres Sarmiento, Germán Riaño. - Universidad de Los Andes
    See Also:
    Iterable, ActionsSet
